name: Mirror of the Ice Barrier
text:
During this turn, each time a card(s) is banished from your hand, field, and/or GY by your opponent's activated monster effect, apply the following effects, based on where the cards were banished from.
● Hand: Banish up to 2 random cards from your opponent's hand.
● Field: Banish up to 2 cards your opponent controls.
● GY: Banish up to 2 cards from your opponent's GY.
